sentences.sentence: Hypertrophy of the pharyngeal tonsils is called adenoids.
sentences.translation: 咽扁桃体的肥大称为腺状肿大。

sentences.sentence: Objective to explore the application of gastric (enteric) -pharyngeal anastomosis for cervical esophageal carcinoma.
sentences.translation: 目的探讨胃(肠)咽吻合术在颈段食管癌手术中的应用。
